title: [Resource] can anyone please share first year syllabus
content: last year's syllabus is also fine, if there r no major changes

comments.body:
join the pes media discord server , you can check syllabus of last year.  
there wont be much changes , 10 to 20% of syllabus changes every 2 years
Yo you'll get all the slides necessary a week into your first semester, use that.

Nigga just enjoy mannn
Worry about it later

im waiting for round 2, my rank is just 100 ranks away from cutoff,   
I don't have any work rn, im bored, thts y I thought of going through syllabus

I can't access discord server, 

im waiting for round 2, my rank is just 100 ranks away from cutoff,Â   
I don't have any work rn, im bored, thts y I thought of going through syllabus,
wt to do sir, from 2 months im sitting at home, Im heavily bored, pls don't recommend series n all im tired of em

would be grateful if u share the syllabus here

![gif](giphy|MFIsOqzodLr7ewnkUb)

Go out make friends , join some clubs. Study is important but first explore  your new life. You have so much to study later . Do not miss out this time.
I wasted my 1st year watching one piece . It was college room onepiece no other activities . I still regret not doing anything back then
PES Media Discord server and PESU server are two different things.
There's a list of things to do to keep yourself busy. Search this subreddit.
